title: Heretic Episode 1 - Three PB's back-to-back [7:04]
description:
These three runs were all good times, but the timing system for this game is odd. Basically it started out  being timed as ingame time minus the boss level. In that timing system I have the world record, previously being 7:09 I got a 7:04.
First run was 7:14, second was 7:04, third was 7:06.
